scenario_text.value: Oh! Takuma, have you seen Shakomon?
Shakomon? No, I haven’t, sorry.
Oh...

Here’s the thing. All of a sudden, Shakomon
just kind of...shambled off.
What do you mean, shambled off?

It was like she was being drawn away by
something, and she couldn’t hear me anymore.

Then while we were looking for Shakomon,
Dracumon disappeared too.
Just like that?

Takuma, what’re we gonna do?! If anything
happens to Shakomon, I... I...

I’m not worried about Dracumon, but if we get
ambushed I don’t know if I can protect Miu...

(Miu’s really worried about Shakomon, and
I can understand Kaito’s concern.)
(I think my priority should be...)
Miu’s feelings.
Kaito’s feelings.
I’ll find Shakomon.
It’s okay, Miu. I’ll go find Shakomon.
You...you mean it?
I do. So you just wait here with Kaito.
Okay, I will. Thanks, Takuma.
I’ll keep an eye out for Dracumon, too.

Thanks. Seriously, though, your main focus
should be Shakomon.
You join the others.

You’d both be in real trouble if you got
attacked. You should join up with the others.
Yeah, that’s the smart thing to do.
But...but what if Shakomon comes back here?

Leave that to me. I’ll go find Shakomon and
take her to you.
You just wait with Kaito, okay?
Okay... I will.

*sigh* Sorry about that, Takuma. You
shouldn’t have to calm Miu down like that.

Don’t mention it. Just be sure you look after
her on your way to meet up with the others.
Hey, you don’t gotta tell me.

We’ll be on our way soon. You just watch
yourself out there, too.
You’d better find Shakomon and Dracumon!
